msbt.message: The time's finally come, kiddo! Halloween at last, !Just in case If you've got candy on you and someone in a costume asks for it, you may wanna give it over.Or not! If you wanna keep your candy and get yourself tricked, that's your decision. And now, with that said
<10_14 arg="20" />Trick or treat, kiddo! If you don't wanna get tricked, you'd best start handin' over your sweets!
Here you go!
No way.
<10_14 arg="20" />Trick or treat, kiddo! If you don't wanna get tricked, you'd best start handin' over your sweets!
Alright, alright Looks like you came prepared. I'll let you off. This time.
You came prepared! Alright, alright! I'm slightly impressed.
Reckon I owe you a treat now, huh? Let's see How about I give you ?
Fair's fair. And I got a treat for you in return. It's a lollipop!Do you know how much they want for a lollipop nowadays? Consider yourself lucky, kiddo
This is awkward. I was all excited to trick you, and now I can'tReckon I do owe you for the candy though. Here, take this recipe for .
Why don't I do my back a treat too? I've been lugging of these here all day!
This Halloween business is quite a time, !
Enjoy the festivities, !
Now just a cobwebbin' minute! Your pockets are STILL full! Go on now, make some room. Go!
Uhyou can't carry anything else. This Halloween stuff ain't gonna keep, so hop to, !
Did you come back for your ? Here!
I reckon you're back for this recipe.
Did you come back for your ? Here!
No sweets? On tonight of all nights? That takes guts, kiddo.Well, ain't nothin' I can do about that. I suppose I'll just have to let you off the hookthis time!
Oh! You don't have any sweets? Ain't that a shameCome on! Get with the program! It's Halloween! Go stuff your pockets with candy and join the festivities!
A trick it is! OK, I'm a bit rusty, but <10_10 />GAAAAAAA-POW!
You brought this on yourself, kiddo. <10_10 />GAAAAAAA-POW!

Whew! That much trickery really takes it out of .How do you like your new look? Now, don't fret none. It's just a little paint.In fact, if you have a mirror, you can go back to lookin' like your old self in no time, .
Speakin' of mirrors, here's too.
Oh! And you can take that face paint off whenever, no mirror needed. Just go into your pockets and take it off!
That came out quite nicely, if I may say so myself. Enjoy your new look, ! Gahaha!

Halloween sure does bring out the mischief in folks, doesn't it?And when it comes to mischief, I say it's share and share alike. That's why I cooked up this Reaction. Observe GOTCHA, KIDDO!Made you jump, huh? So if you ever need to give someone the business, just hit 'em with Scare, .
Where's your candy, kiddo? And don't go tellin' me you ain't got any. It's Halloween, !Well, I reckon I can spare you a little. But don't let it go to your head, you hear? This is a one-time favor!
There, you're set. But look out! From here on, I'll be comin' for your candy without any compunction at all!
Oh yeah! You can use Reactions by pressin' î‚§. There's lots of others to be had as well, so keep an eye out!
I love seeing everyone all dressed up for Halloween. It helps me know who I oughta bother for candy. Gahaha!
I'm not really the dressin'-up type, but I ain't about to pass up a chance to make my neighbors jump! Gahaha!
You scare folks, and you get scared by folks. You give out candy, and you get handed candy. Ah, Halloween!
Are my eyes playing tricks, or is the sky lookin' a bitodd, ?It's almost like the air itself wants in on the Halloween fun. Way to set the mood, air!
So you came. I knew you would. After all, today is Halloween!
Back again? Hey, if you wanna spend your Halloween with me, I ain't about to stop you.
So where's your costume, kiddo? I'm only giving out candy to folks wearin' a scary costumeand you ain't.Well, I reckon it's not too late. Go get something scary on and come back. I'll be waitin', !

I just hope you're not here for more candy. I only have so much, so I'm tryin' to pace myself, .But I'll tell you what. If you really want more candy, swing by a little later, and I'll see what I can do.
And what a wonderful costume you're wearin'! Here, have some candy. I insist, !
I suppose you want more candy, huh? Well, I'm sure I've got some here I can spare ya, .
I'm sure there's plenty more candy you'd like to get your hands on, so don't let me keep you!
Halloween's a-wastin', so you'd best get back out there and enjoy it!
Oh, uh Except it looks like you can't carry anything else, kiddo.Guess I'll just be holdin' on to this tempting, delicious candy while you clear some space. Come back soon!

Wait How's it possible for you not to have even one piece of candy? That boggles the mind!I wouldn't normally do this, but I'm feelin' charitable. I'm gonna give you some candy. But only a little!Oh, and don't go expectin' this to happen again, you hear me? Fact is, I'm already over bein' charitable.
There! Now if anyone asks, you can say you've got some to give out. Run along, kiddo!
Whaddaya think of my costume? I wasn't sure about it at first, but then I figured, it's Halloween!How many opportunities do you get to dress any ol' way you like and nobody bats an eye, ?
It's high time I went out and gave folks a taste of my scarin' technique. I'm about out of candy, .
If it's more candy you're after, kiddo, come back in a bit. I don't wanna run out too fast, .
Try as I might to deny it, there's just something about Halloween that lights a fire in me, .The closer it gets, the more I'm bouncin' with excitement. Right now, I'd almost call myself giddy!
J-J-Jack! Please don't trick me! Please! Here, take some candy!
Now wait just a pumpkin-carvin' minute. You're !That costume really had me sweatin'! If you wanted to scare the daylights out of me, well Good job, kiddo!But please don't ever do that again.

Now hang on! You ain't Jack at all! Don't frighten me like that, kiddo!But if you're not Jack, then who are you? , huh?I'm pleased to meet you. The name's .So, do you usually go around scaring the ever-livin' daylights out of total strangers, ?'Cause I can certainly think of more neighborly ways of makin' friends, if you're open to suggestions
Um I'm s-sorry, but it looks like you can't h-hold anything else. So, I guess that's that<10_4 /> Right?
